title: Service disruption due to platform doors fault on East West Line

updates.text: [EWL] CLEARED: Train services between #Bugis and #PasirRis have resumed.
[EWL] Update: Fault has been cleared. However, trains maybe travelling at a slower speed.
[EWL] Update: Additional travelling time remains at 15mins. Our engineers are working to recover the service.
[EWL]: Estimate 15mins additional travelling time between #Bugis and #PasirRis due to platform doors fault.
